<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/login"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Autentica un usuario revendedor y devuelve un token JWT

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["email","password"],"properties":{"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","example":"admin@qr.buho.la"},"password":{"type":"string","format":"password","example":"bh0yJj2C"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Login exitoso","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"api_token":{"type":"string","description":"Token JWT para autenticación"},"user":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer"},"email":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Credenciales inválidas"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
